articles.title: Argentina 2021 economic growth forecast raised to 7.2% - central bank survey
articles.description: Argentina's economy will grow 7.2% in 2021, analysts said in an Argentine central bank poll published on Friday, an improvement on their forecast last month of 6.8% growth.
articles.content:
Pedestrians walk in front of a currency exchange shop in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina September 3, 2019. REUTERS/Agustin Marcarian
BUENOS AIRES (Reuters) - Argentina’s economy will grow 7.2% in 2021, analysts said in an Argentine central bank pol... [693 chars]

articles.title: Chilean president defends territorial claim in spat with Argentina
articles.description: Chile on Friday reasserted its claim to undersea territory off its southern coast in a dispute with Argentina, which has said Santiago's move violates international treaties. Chile last week officially laid claim to 5,000 square kilometers (1,930 square miles) of continental shelf in the Drake Sea between Chile's Cape Horn, its mainland and the South Shetland Islands of Antarctica.
articles.content:
Chile on Friday reasserted its claim to undersea territory off its southern coast in a dispute with Argentina, which has said Santiago's move violates international treaties.

articles.title: Depleted Brazil To Face Revamped Argentina In WC Qualifying
articles.description: SAO PAULO: When Brazil hosts Argentina in Sunday’s World Cup qualifier, it may not be fair to call it a rematch of the Copa America final from less than two months ago.
articles.content:
SAO PAULO: When Brazil hosts Argentina in Sunday’s World Cup qualifier, it may not be fair to call it a rematch of the Copa America final from less than two months ago.

articles.title: Southern right whale gives paddleboarder a push in Argentina
articles.description: A drone photographer in Argentina captured video of the moment a southern right whale swam up to a paddleboarder and gave the board a push.
articles.content:
Sept. 3 (UPI) -- A drone photographer in Argentina captured video of the moment a southern right whale swam up to a paddleboarder and gave the board a push.

articles.title: World's largest rodents are taking over a fancy gated community in Argentina
articles.description: Capybaras have overrun a gated community in Argentina which was controversially built over their original habitat.
articles.content:
Capybaras feeding on grass near a main road in the gated community Nordelta, north of Buenos Aires on Aug. 26. (Image credit: STRINGER/AFP via Getty Images)

articles.title: Tottenham and Aston Villa in new row with Argentina over availability of international players
articles.description: Premier Leagues Argentine players defied orders not to travel on international duty; Aston Villa and Tottenham agreed to release Emiliano Buendia, Emiliano Martinez, Giovani Lo Celso and Cristian Romero to Argentina if they were released after Sundays game against Brazil

articles.title: Lionel Messi targeted by horror red card tackle in Argentina win
articles.description: Messi laid in agony on the turf after being chopped down by Venezuela's Adrian Martinez - who was subsequently sent off - during Argentina's 3-1 win in their World Cup qualifier in Caracas
